content.rendered:
We are all well aware of Mussoorie’s unparalleled natural beauty during the light of day, but do you know that as the sun goes down, visitors get to see a whole new and different side of this humble old hill town. If you thought that this Garhwali city does not have anything to offer during the night time then think again! Nightlife in Mussoorie is a rapidly developing new way of making Mussoorie a fun getaway no matter the time of the day. Dotted with interesting pubs, themed clubs, quirky cafes, and other hangout spots, this gorgeous hill station is becoming one of the best hill destinations with a thumping and fun nightlife, especially during the peak season. Wondering where to go for a fun nightlife experience in Mussoorie? Check out these places:

Nightlife in Mussoorie – Best Clubs and Bars in Mussoorie

Marshal’s Lounge

Housed inside the grand, 5-star hotel Jaypee hotels, Marshal’s lounge graces the heart of Mussoorie. If it is exquisite food, top-notch hospitality, and delicious food against the backdrop of a comfortable, fine dine set up then this lounge should be on your visit list. This place is extremely affordable and the entire set has a beautiful colonial charm to it which feels like you are teleported back in time. You can pair your favorite drinks here through its well-stocked bar with a range of continental food choices.

Woody Barrel

Woody barrel continues to dominate the charts for being one of the most happening destinations for memorable nightlife. This place is the most popular among the younger crowd of Mussoorie so you can imagine the energy this place has to offer. The interiors are true to the seemingly ongoing theme of cafes and restaurants in Mussoorie which is the colonial style. If it is a relaxed, chilled-out evening you want along with delicious food and drinks of your choice, then the woody barrel is just the place for you.

Sicoh Bar and Restaurant

While going around in the mall road make sure to head to Sicoh Bar and restaurant, an iconic eatery that continues to attract thousands of customers throughout the year. Due to its location and the promise of delectable food, this palace has become a very popular chill spot, especially during nighttime. The buzzing city central location will allow you to enjoy your time even more. Popular for its service and food collection, Sicoh Bar and restaurant is the perfect place to unwind and chill out with your family and loved ones.

Nostradamus

Nostradamus, or also referred to as the Writer’s bar, is a unique bar that still carries an otherworldly charm to it. Nostradamus has to be one of the most popular places in Mussoorie that offers a wide-ranging selection of domestic and international drinks. The decoration of the bar restores the colonial vibe and takes you back in time. They even have shelves of different books for the customers to come here and read them. The bar follows a strict rule of wearing smart casuals and formals. Although a bit on the expensive side this would make a great place to go for a fine dining experience with your loved ones.

The Tavern

Speaking of popular hangout chill spots in Mussoorie, the tavern is a must-visit for some good vibes and chill music. What makes this place special is the presence of live music that pulls the whole environment together in one string. The place offers a laid-back evening along with some world-class level of entertainment. The fun vibe and great ambiance will make you forget the time along with some delicious food and a fantastic alcohol lineup. Being located on the mall road has also helped with the tavern’s popularity.

Urban Turban Bistro

This place is one of a kind in Mussoorie. Urban Turban is a fun place where most youths can be seen hanging out. The interiors are quirky, the lighting is interesting and the music is always banging. If a fun night out with your friends is something you want, then an urban turban bistro is something you should give a try. The highlight of this place lies in the fun and quirky texts displayed on the walls, left by the bistro goers. The menu is mainly dominated by the Indian Chinese style of cooking. When it comes to drinking there are a couple of top-notch cocktails that can be ordered. The best part about the food menu is the fish delicacies.

Emily’s Restaurant

If your day entails checking out the Rokeby manor then Emily’s restaurant should not be missed out. Located very close to the manor the restaurant which identifies more like a cafe, chill spot, has an exceptional selection of cakes and pastries. If it is biryani you are craving then Emily’s restaurant has one of the best biryanis in Mussoorie.  They even offer some homemade food products like jam and pie which you can get packed and take back home. Located in Landour cantonment, this place is all about good food and fantastic views.

Cafe Ivy

What makes this cafe hangout spot truly a magical experience is its location. Placed gracefully on a spot overlooking the hills and valley below this cafe is a great place to spend some time with your friends and loved ones. Even if you wish to go on a fun and romantic date the cafe ivy would be the place for it. With the pizza being a bestseller, you can also try out their huge assortment of delicious warm and cold beverages. Sure it’s a good place to spend a chill night out but it is equally a fun experience during day time.

During your travels to Mussoorie, you will discover that this place is dotted with many famous and not-so-famous cafes and bars that continue to attract people for their uniqueness.
